name: bnj1292
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)

-| wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)

|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wss(cin(c1, c2), c1)
